title: Are the Patriots in trouble & can the Browns actually make the playoffs?
itunes:title: Are the Patriots in trouble & can the Browns actually make the playoffs?
description:
The Good Morning Football Crew starts up with their Week 15 takeaways such as the Eagles defeating the Rams in LA (0:29) and the Steelers big win over the Patriots (6:01). The gang then gets into the things they learned from Week 15 like Darius Leonard being "The Maniac" (36:00) and how DeForest Buckner is one of the best defensive players in the NFL (42:41). Lastly, Kay Adams, Nate Burleson, and Kyle Brandt listen to Peter Schrager explain how the Cleveland Browns can still make the playoffs (53:20). Be sure to check in every Wednesday to the GMFB podcast! Like, share, subscribe!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
